title: Have The Beatles sold more records than Elvis Presley? - Quora

response.answer_text: I like the question! No. Elvis far outsold the Beatles. Elvis’ record sales have been in excess of 1.7 billion records worldwide and this EXCLUDES Sony’s updated calculations as they have never been audited/modified in over a decade. PLUS Colonel Parker and RCA had some “unique” accounting practices of Elvis’ sales to say the least. Elvis dominated in the categories of; Rock, Gospel and Christmas. His image, likeness, voice, etc. is an American success story - an American bonafide legend - a Worldwide legend - and his recordings continue to sell millions. Unfairly, Elvis lived during the time that the US and World populations were a fraction of what they are now. That there was no such thing as; downloads, streaming, YouTube, Internet, etc. thus the only way - until RCA came out with the “music club” whereby they allowed you to buy a few records free and then crushed you on the “have to buy in the future prices” - to buy records/albums was to physically go to the store and physically buy them. I know firsthand as I have lived it for 7 decades. Take care Jeff
